title: Direction of magnetic field due to two wires

content.question: Which of the following best represents the direction of the net magnetic field at point <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>P</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: The figure presents an arrow pointing diagonally upwards and to the right
The figure presents an arrow pointing horizontally to the right
The figure presents and arrow pointing vertically upwards
The figure presents an arrow pointing horizontally to the left
The figure presents and arrow pointing vertically downwards

content.answer: The figure presents an arrow pointing horizontally to the left
